campaigns.title: Our CEPA Initiatives
campaigns.intro: We raise awareness and foster participation in the conservation of the Philippine crocodile and its habitat through CEPA (Communication, Education, Participation, Awareness) programs.

items.title: School Campaigns
items.text: Educational programs in schools that teach children the importance of protecting wildlife and the environment.

items.title: Community Engagement
items.text: Working with local communities to strengthen conservation awareness and promote sustainable practices.

items.title: Media & Outreach
items.text: Radio programs, posters, and social media campaigns spreading the message of biodiversity conservation.

items.title: Youth & Volunteers
items.text: Encouraging the youth and volunteers to become conservation advocates through interactive activities.
